com.bahmanm.utils.geometry

Class Points

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bahmanm.utils.geometry.Points

  • public final class Points
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of methods and operations on points.

      Checks if a point "dominates" another point.
      P dominates O iff for every dimension d, P[d] >= O[d] for at least one dimension d, P[d] > O[d]

      Multiplies coordinates of two given points.

      Normalises the coordinates of a given point to be in the nth orthant according to a given origin.
      Examples: [1,4] to 1st orthant according to [2,2] -> [3,4] [1,4] to 3rd orthant according to [2,2] -> [1,0]

      Translates a given point's coordinates to a space with a given origin.
      static Point trimNegative(Point p)
      Trims all negative coordinates to zero.
      static Point trimRelative(Point p, Point origin)
      Trims all coordinates of a given point which are smaller than a given origin to the value of origin.
      Example (2d): trim [1, 4] according to [3, 2] -> [3, 4]

      • Points

        public Points()

    • Method Detail

      • isDominates

        public static boolean isDominates(Point p,
                                  Point o)
        Checks if a point "dominates" another point.
        P dominates O iff
        • for every dimension d, P[d] >= O[d]
        • for at least one dimension d, P[d] > O[d]
        Parameters:
        p - point
        o - point
        Returns:
        True if P dominates O, False otherwise.

      • toOrthant

        public static Point toOrthant(Point p,
                              Point origin,
                              int orthant)
        Normalises the coordinates of a given point to be in the nth orthant according to a given origin.
        Examples:
        • [1,4] to 1st orthant according to [2,2] -> [3,4]
        • [1,4] to 3rd orthant according to [2,2] -> [1,0]
        Parameters:
        p - the tiven point
        origin - the given origin
        orthant - orthant number
        Returns:
        a new point with coordinates normalised to the given orthant according to the given origin

      • toFirstOrthant

        public static Point toFirstOrthant(Point p,
                                   Point origin)
        See Also:
        toOrthant(Point, Point, int)

      • distance

        public static Point distance(Point p,
                             Point o)
        Calculate the distance between two points by subtracting dimensions. Example: [1, 3] distance from [2, 0.5] -> [-1, 2.5]
        Parameters:
        p - point (from)
        o - point (to)
        Returns:
        a point which is basically the difference between P and O dimensions.

      • distanceAbs

        public static Point distanceAbs(Point p,
                                Point o)
        Calculate the distance between two points by subtracting dimensions and using the absolute value. Example: [1, 3] distance to [2, 0.5] -> [1, 2.5]
        Parameters:
        p - point (from)
        o - point (to)
        Returns:
        a point which is basically the difference between P and O dimensions.

      • compare

        public static int compare(Point p,
                          Point o)
        Compares two points.
        Parameters:
        p - point
        o - point
        Returns:
        • 0 if all coordinates are equal
        • 1 if P(d) > O(d) for smallest value of d
        • -1 if P(d) < O(d) for smallest value of d

      • multiply

        public static Point multiply(Point p,
                             Point o)
        Multiplies coordinates of two given points.
        Parameters:
        p - point
        o - point
        Returns:
        a new point with coordinates as the product of the coordinates of the given points

      • plus

        public static Point plus(Point p,
                         Point o)
        Adds coordinates of two given points.
        Parameters:
        p - point
        o - point
        Returns:
        a new point with coordinates as the sum of the coordinates of the given points

      • negate

        public static Point negate(Point p)
        Negates all the coordinates of a given point.
        Parameters:
        p - the given point
        Returns:
        a new point with coordinates as the negated value of the coordinates of the given point

      • trimNegative

        public static Point trimNegative(Point p)
        Trims all negative coordinates to zero. Example (2d): [-5, 1] -> [0, 1]
        Parameters:
        p - the given point
        Returns:
        a new point with all coordinates >=0

      • trimRelative

        public static Point trimRelative(Point p,
                                 Point origin)
        Trims all coordinates of a given point which are smaller than a given origin to the value of origin.
        Example (2d): trim [1, 4] according to [3, 2] -> [3, 4]
        Parameters:
        p - the given point
        origin - the given origin
        Returns:
        a new point with all coordinates trimed according to the given origin

      • translate

        public static Point translate(Point p,
                              Point origin)
        Translates a given point's coordinates to a space with a given origin. 2D example: translate [5, 8] to origin [2, 2] -> [3, 6]
        Parameters:
        p - the given point
        origin - the given origin
        Returns:
        a new point with translated coordinates according to the given origin
